text: Anabel Gutiérrez Aicua (17 September 1931 – 21 August 2022) was a Mexican actress and comedian. She was known for her movie role in School for Tramps (1955) and for playing the character of Doña Espotaverderona in some sketches in Chespirito (1970). Gutiérrez died on 21 August 2022 in Puebla de Zaragoza, Mexico, a few weeks before her 91st birthday. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican comedians Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:People from Puebla (state)
title: Anabel Gutiérrez
